requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9700F CPU @ 3.00GHz 3.00 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060.
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High definition Audio
  • VR Support: SteamVR.

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4th generation or similar

  • Additional Notes: Gamepad recommended. Xbox style works best. PS5 controller NOT supported. PS4 controller works.
